damoore.player

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • damoore.player.PlayerController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(path="/player")
public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    A web controller class that maps weblinks after /player and adds or returns data from the player table using the PlayerRepository.
    Author:
    damoore

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addPlayer(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, java.lang.Integer numGames, java.lang.Integer numWins)
      This method is used to map the ability to add/update a player to the player table to keep track of the all the players and their statistics and will be called by the client via android volley.
      java.lang.Iterable<Player> getAllPlayers()
      This method is used to retrieve all players from the player table.
      java.lang.Iterable<Player> getPlayer(java.lang.String name)
      This method is used to retrieve a specific player from the player table.

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayer

        @GetMapping(path="/add")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String addPlayer(@RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String name,
                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String password,
                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.Integer numGames,
                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.Integer numWins)
        This method is used to map the ability to add/update a player to the player table to keep track of the all the players and their statistics and will be called by the client via android volley.
        Parameters:
        name - String This is the username of the player.
        password - String This is the password associated with the given player.
        numGames - Integer This is the number of games won by the player.
        numWins - Integer This is the number of games played by the player.
        Returns:
        A String confirmation with the username and "added".

      • getPlayer

        @GetMapping(path="/find/{name}")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Iterable<Player> getPlayer(@PathVariable
                                                                                              java.lang.String name)
        This method is used to retrieve a specific player from the player table.
        Parameters:
        name - String This is the username of the player you want to find.
        Returns:
        A Iterable Player list containing the player with the submitted username.

      • getAllPlayers

        @GetMapping(path="/all")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Iterable<Player> getAllPlayers()
        This method is used to retrieve all players from the player table.
        Returns:
        An iterable Player list of all the players from the player table.
